They're like making my voice onto a thing, like, that's crazy. Like, right now, it's crazy, heh. Um, so for this last one, um all I say—all I wanna say and all I ask is that just we all to just try to be, um, just try to be, um, just happy that we're alive and happy that we're breathing and that we're here and we're safe and, um, that's pretty much it.
